text:
Tigerspike| Senior Android & Javascript Full Stack Enginer| FULL TIME | LONDON onsite with some remote working possible |https://tigerspike.com/

Tigerspike is a Digital Services company with a mission to 'Improve people's lives through technology'. We have 10 offices across 4 continents, each creating web & mobile (consumer & enterprise) apps for a range of industries, with clients such as Emirates, New Look, The UN & Westfield.

If you want the opportunity to widen your scope and pick up new technologies and cross train in new platforms/ frameworks in a global company with travel opportunities then get in touch: michelle.coulson@tigerspike.com

More info: http://bit.ly/SnrAndroid http://bit.ly/FullstackJs
